text: Hello. In chapter 905 of volume 90, what's the name of the woman with the black hair and the mechanical-looking arm to the left of Koala when she's talking to Betty?

Ah. Well, the Revolutionary Army has five captains for the four seas and the Grand Line. Each captain has an aide who acts as their second-in-command, the way that Grand Line Revolutionary Captain Ivankov has Inazuma as a deputy. So she is Eastern Forces Captain Belo Betty's aide, Vice Captain Ahiru. Does she have a big role to play in the future? I don't know.
Why are the clouds of Wano, I mean, why are your farts different from the usual farts?!
Are you saying what I think you're saying? Have you been under the assumption that all the things you see floating in the sky are my farts?
They're clouds!! Clouds float in the sky!!

And yes, they look different in Wano!
Since it's Wano, I've been trying to make everything look more like the classic ukiyo-e art style, and that's why they're different from the usual farts. Poot!
Q: How does Kaido fly when he's in dragon form?
I've heard that Asian-style dragons fly by grabbing clouds. So Kaido is creating clouds and walking across them to move in the air.
